info.title: kodit API
info.description:
This is the REST API for the Kodit server. Please refer to the
[Kodit documentation](https://docs.helix.ml/kodit/) for more information.

get.description: Return a health check for the kodit API.

List all tasks in the queue.

Optionally filter by task type.
Get details of a specific task in the queue.

post.description: Search code snippets with filters matching MCP tool.

get.description: List all commits for a repository.
Get a specific commit for a repository.
List all files in a specific commit.
Get a specific file from a commit.

404.description: Repository, commit or file not found

get.description: List all snippets in a specific commit.
List all embeddings for snippets in a specific commit.

parameters.name: full

schema.description: If true, return full vectors. If false, return first 5 values.
schema.title: Full

parameters.description: If true, return full vectors. If false, return first 5 values.

get.description: List all enrichments for a specific commit.

delete.description: Delete all enrichments for a specific commit.
Delete a specific enrichment for a commit.

404.description: Repository, commit, or enrichment not found

post.description: Create a new repository or trigger re-indexing if it exists.

get.description: Get repository details including branches and recent commits.

delete.description: Delete a repository and all its associated data.

get.description: Get the status of tasks for an index.
Get a summary of the repository indexing status.
List all tags for a repository.
Get a specific tag for a repository.

List the most recent enrichments for a repository.

Uses the repository's tracking_config to find the most recent enriched commit.

Query parameters:
- enrichment_type: Optional filter for specific enrichment type.
- max_commits_to_check: Number of recent commits to search (default: 100).
- limit: Maximum number of enrichments to return. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: max_commits_to_check

schema.description: Number of recent commits to search for recent enriched commits
schema.title: Max Commits To Check

parameters.description: Number of recent commits to search for recent enriched commits

get.description: List all enrichments with optional filtering.
Get a specific enrichment by ID.
